description:
If the policy.json file cannot be found, then the API server will silently return 404 errors.

This is because the ConfigNotFound exception is derived from the NotFound exception which the OSAPI code will convert to a silent 404 error to the client and logs.

As a test, I changed the parent class for ConfigNotFound to NovaException instead and it then printed a nice traceback explaining that it couldn't find policy.json and returned a 500 error to the client.

This was tested with a 'nova list' command, but it would likely be the same for any OSAPI request that called check_policy (everything?).
title: Missing policy.json file results in silent 404 errors

    Make sure an exception is logged when config file isn't found
    
    Fixes bug 1006457
    
    Since exception.ConfigNotFound was derived from exception.NotFound, it
    would result in a silent 404 error being returned to the client instead
    of logging a useful error message that a necessary config file was
    missing and returning a 500 error.
